title: State-Level Achievement Test Scores and Likelihood of Voting for Biden
selftext:
On the x-axis is the rank of each US state according to PSAT scores ([https://blog.prepscholar.com/psat-score-needed-for-national-merit-scholarship](https://blog.prepscholar.com/psat-score-needed-for-national-merit-scholarship)). On the y-axis is the likelihood of each state voting for Biden according to political betting sites. The red line is the best-fit line for the data (P<.0001).

https://preview.redd.it/bchxlj0umds51.jpg?width=1558&format=pjpg&auto=webp&s=9c53119fbdb1f1ecd1db95394cb5f01984a99164
